class runninglog.single_run.single_run.SingleRun[source]¶
as_dict()[source]¶

Converts segment into dictionary. This is later used to build a panda’s DataFrame representation

fill_basic_runtype_info_with_global_type()[source]¶

Only applied when no structure was found

It requires self.type, self.total_distance and self.total_time to be set beforehand

parse_type(type_str)[source]¶

Parses run type. If not found, set it to E.
